授業方法:
In principle, this class will be face-to-face; however, all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class.

Depending on enrollment and the evolving COVID-19 situation, course format may include the following:
- timed 5-minute writing
- lecture on scheduled topic
- class discussion on scheduled topic
- person-to-person consultations
You should have a stable wifi or internet connection at home to complete all out-of-class assignments.
